name: A Rhyming Ape - Lupe Fiasco Tee
description: Design printed on a Black or Brown American Apparel T-shirt The design features a Rhyming Ape logo with Lupe Fiasco’s face superimposed into the countenance, and of course, his classic rimmed glasses. (A spin on the BAPE brand that Lupe has been so fond of). Below the logo are two detailed mics crossing like skull bones. The prolific rapper dropped an infamous trilogy of mixtapes known as Fahrenheit 1/15: Part I, II, & III. The last mixtape known as “A Rhyming Ape” features Lupe Fiasco rapping over Gorrilaz beats and include some of his most thought-provoking rhymes ever released. This t-shirt commemorates Lupe Fiasco as his self-proclaimed nickname “A Rhyming Ape”. We just released a new colorway – a Brown Tee!! Please Note: Shipping for this shirt is $5 in the U.S, and $12 Internationally, it will be calculated when you get to the PayPal checkout page.

name: New Edition Tee
description: Design Printed on a Black American Apparel T-shirt. A tribute to the 5 boys from Orchard Park, Roxbury, Ma. The R&B group otherwise known as New Edition. Celebrate Ronnie, Bobby, Ricky, Mike & Ralph with All Souled Out’s rendition of the “Someone & Someone” t-shirt. We created the lettering of the names in the design with a candy cane pattern, reminiscent of the album cover for New Edition’s hit song “Candy Girl”. The t-shirt design will certainly invoke memories for anyone who grew up listening to old school music. Please Note: Shipping is $5, it will be calculated when you get to the PayPal checkout page.

name: Die Hard Teddy (with a 40 oz.)
description: Die Hard Teddy (with a 40 oz.) Tee Shirt Printed on American Apparel Tees. Available in 2 colors: Heather Grey & Brown A concept based off the super smash movie series Die Hard. You all know Bruce Willis’ character, John McClane, aka Roy Rogers. T-shirt design was inspired by elements of the movie—McClane kills one of the terrorists – then writes a message on the dead guy’s sweatshirt…”Now I Have A Machine Gun Ho-Ho-Ho”. McClane was carrying a teddy bear on the plane from NY to LA. While Nakatomi towers is getting blown to pieces Teddy sits in the front seat alongside the Limo driver rocking out to tunes. We gave Teddy a pair of Vanilla Ice Blazers and let him kick back with a 40 oz while smoking the signature Bruce Willis cigarette. Merry Christmas everyone, now Teddy has the machine gun.

name: Celtics "Finally 17" - Championship Tee
description:
The wait is over, 22 long years and the Celtics Finally bring home Championship number 17!!

It was a long drought for us die-hard fans. How sweet it tastes!

Celebrate by wearing the "Finally 17" t-shirt design - inspired by the NBA Finals logo -- incorporating the Celtics alternate Shamrock logo and or course, the number 17!

Finally Design printed on a Black T-shirt.

Available in styles for:

- Men
- Women
- Youth 

(if you would like a specific shirt size or shirt color that is not available in the drop down menu, please email me with your request and I will print if for you!)
